xwikidoc.name: Translations
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.content:
platform.core.profile.category.notifications=알림 notifications.filters.cancel=취소 notifications.filters.submit=구하다 notifications.filters.type.label=필터 유형: notifications.filters.type.hint=필터가 특정 위치의 이벤트에 대해 어떻게 작동해야 하는지 notifications.filters.location.label=필터 범위: notifications.filters.location.hint=위키의 어떤 부분이 필터와 관련되어야 합니까?
## Advanced filters options notifications.settings.filters.advanced=고급 필터링 옵션 notifications.filters.advanced.toggles.hint=이러한 필터는 기본적으로 활성화되어 있으며, 각 필터 옆에 있는 버튼을 사용하여 비활성화할 수 있습니다. notifications.filters.advanced.toggles.table.name=필터 이름 notifications.filters.advanced.toggles.table.description=설명 notifications.filters.advanced.toggles.table.toggle=비녀장 notifications.filters.advanced.modal.close=닫다
## Filters names notifications.filters.name.systemUserNotificationFilter=시스템 필터 notifications.filters.description.systemUserNotificationFilter=역이 저장되었지만, 일부 새롭게 실패한 검사가 있습니다: 일치하지 않는 마침표(.) notifications.filters.name.ownEventsNotificationFilter=자체 이벤트 필터 notifications.filters.description.ownEventsNotificationFilter=이벤트가 특별히 귀하를 대상으로 하지 않는 한 귀하의 활동에 대한 알림을 숨깁니다. ### Missing: notifications.filters.name.eventReadAlertFilter=Read Event Filter (Alert) ### Missing: notifications.filters.description.eventReadAlertFilter=Hide notifications that you have marked as read ### Missing: notifications.filters.name.eventReadEmailFilter=Read Event Filter (Email) ### Missing: notifications.filters.description.eventReadEmailFilter=Hide notifications that you have marked as read ### Missing: notifications.filters.name.minorEventAlertNotificationFilter=Minor Event (Alert) ### Missing: notifications.filters.description.minorEventAlertNotificationFilter=Hide notifications concerning minor changes on pages ### Missing: notifications.filters.name.minorEventEmailNotificationFilter=Minor Event (Email) ### Missing: notifications.filters.description.minorEventEmailNotificationFilter=Hide notifications concerning minor changes on pages
## Translation keys for the scopeNotificationFilter ### Missing: notifications.filters.preferences.scopeNotificationFilter.name=Scope Notification Filter ### Missing: notifications.filters.preferences.scopeNotificationFilter.page=Page only ### Missing: notifications.filters.preferences.scopeNotificationFilter.space=Page and children ### Missing: notifications.filters.preferences.scopeNotificationFilter.wiki=Wiki
## Notifications toggles ### Missing: notifications.toggle.disabled.hint=You need to enable notifications in your settings if you wish to watch these locations
## Notifications formats ### Missing: notifications.format.alert=Alert ### Missing: notifications.format.email=Email
## Filter preferences settings ### Missing: notifications.filters.preferences.delete.inProgress=Deleting... ### Missing: notifications.filters.preferences.delete.done=Filter preference deleted! ### Missing: notifications.filters.preferences.delete.error=Failed to delete the filter preference ### Missing: notifications.filters.preferences.setEnabled.inProgress=Saving... ### Missing: notifications.filters.preferences.setEnabled.done=Filter preference saved! ### Missing: notifications.filters.preferences.setEnabled.error=Failed to save the filter preference ### Missing: notifications.filters.preferences.allEvents=All events (even disabled)
## System Filter preferences settings ### Missing: notifications.settings.filters.preferences.system.title=System Filters ### Missing: notifications.settings.filters.preferences.system.hint=System filters that you can switches to have a more fine-grained control of the notifications you want to receive. ## Header definition for notification filter preferences ### Missing: notifications.settings.filters.preferences.system.table.name=Name ### Missing: notifications.settings.filters.preferences.system.table.filterType=Description ### Missing: notifications.settings.filters.preferences.system.table.notificationFormats=Formats ### Missing: notifications.settings.filters.preferences.system.table.isEnabled=Is enabled?
## Custom Filter preferences settings ### Missing: notifications.settings.filters.preferences.custom.title=Custom Filters ### Missing: notifications.settings.filters.preferences.custom.hint=Create filters to control the notifications you want to receive. ## Header definition for notification filter preferences ### Missing: notifications.settings.filters.preferences.custom.table.name=Location ### Missing: notifications.settings.filters.preferences.custom.table.filterType=Filter Action ### Missing: notifications.settings.filters.preferences.custom.table.eventTypes=Events ### Missing: notifications.settings.filters.preferences.custom.table.notificationFormats=Formats ### Missing: notifications.settings.filters.preferences.custom.table.isEnabled=Is enabled? ### Missing: notifications.settings.filters.preferences.custom.table._actions=Actions ### Missing: notifications.filters.type.custom.inclusive=Notify of the event ### Missing: notifications.filters.type.custom.exclusive=Ignore the event
## Add filter modal ### Missing: notifications.settings.addFilter=Add filter ### Missing: notifications.settings.addFilter.hint=Create a filter for events happening on specific locations. The filter can trigger the sending of a notification or prevent one from being sent, depending on the event and the notification channel. ### Missing: notifications.filters.preferences.custom.addFilter.location.label=Location ### Missing: notifications.filters.preferences.custom.addFilter.location.hint=This filter applies on the events happening on the locations selected here. Select one or more locations. ### Missing: notifications.filters.preferences.custom.addFilter.type.label=Action ### Missing: notifications.filters.preferences.custom.addFilter.type.hint=This filter can either notify of or ignore the events happening on the selected locations. Choose the action you want to take for the events. ### Missing: notifications.filters.preferences.custom.addFilter.filterType.inclusive=Notify of the event ### Missing: notifications.filters.preferences.custom.addFilter.filterType.exclusive=Ignore the event ### Missing: notifications.filters.preferences.custom.addFilter.notificationFormat.label=Channel ### Missing: notifications.filters.preferences.custom.addFilter.notificationFormat.hint=This filter applies only to the notifications sent on the communication channels selected below. Choose one or more communication channels. ### Missing: notifications.filters.preferences.custom.addFilter.eventType.label=Events ### Missing: notifications.filters.preferences.custom.addFilter.eventType.hint=This filter applies to the events selected here, in the locations selected above. Choose one or more events. ### Missing: notifications.menu.header=Notifications ### Missing: notifications.menu.header.settings=Settings ### Missing: notifications.menu.clear=Clear All ### Missing: notifications.menu.clearing=Clearing the notifications ### Missing: notifications.menu.cleared=Notifications have been cleared ### Missing: notifications.settings.title=Notifications Preferences ### Missing: notifications.settings.error.notAdmin=You need to be administrator to see this. ### Missing: notifications.settings.menu=Notification menu ### Missing: notifications.settings.menu.hint=The notification menu is located on the top right of the page, and you can see it by clicking on the bell ({0}) ### Missing: notifications.settings.email=Email ### Missing: notifications.settings.email.forGuest=Log in or register to handle your notification settings. ### Missing: notifications.settings.email.disabled=The notifications emails are disabled. Please contact your administrator. ### Missing: notifications.settings.email.hint=An email is sent to you regularly with a summary of what happened on the wiki ### Missing: notifications.settings.email.title=Email Preferences ### Missing: notifications.settings.email.frequency=Email Frequency ### Missing: notifications.settings.email.frequency.hint=Choose how often you want to receive an email with the summary of what happened on the wiki. ### Missing: notifications.settings.email.diffType.hint=Select the level of detail you want to receive about all the changes in the email. ### Missing: notifications.settings.saving=Your settings are being saved... ### Missing: notifications.settings.saved=Saved! ### Missing: notifications.settings.savingfailed=Failed to save your settings ### Missing: notifications.settings.filters=Filters ({0}) ### Missing: notifications.settings.errorFilterWiki=Error: you must select a wiki, not a page ### Missing: notifications.settings.preferences=Preferences ### Missing: notifications.settings.preferences.hint=Capture what events are happening and deliver them in the stream or by email. ### Missing: notifications.settings.applications.title=Applications ### Missing: notifications.settings.applications.hint=This is the list of applications that can send notifications. You can enable or disable any of them. ### Missing: notifications.settings.applications.forGuest=Log in or register to handle your notification settings. ### Missing: notifications.settings.applications.appName=Name ### Missing: notifications.settings.applications.table.dropdown.toggle.label=Toggle the details for notifications from the {0} application. ### Missing: notifications.settings.events=Events ### Missing: notifications.settings.watch.title=Watched Pages ### Missing: notifications.settings.watch.autowatchmode=Automatic page watching ### Missing: notifications.settings.watch.autowatchmode.hint=Decide if you wish to watch a page after you have worked on it ### Missing: notifications.settings.watch.forGuest=Log in or register to handle your notification settings. ### Missing: notifications.settings.watch.disabled=The watched entities are disabled. Please contact your administrator. ### Missing: notifications.events.by=edited by {0}. ### Missing: notifications.events.lastChange=Last change: {0}. ### Missing: notifications.events.lastComment=Last comment: {0}. ### Missing: notifications.preferences.scope.table.scope=Scope ### Missing: notifications.preferences.scope.table.location=Location ### Missing:
